title: Tighten chatroom header stat gaps and reposition LIVE badge

requirements.text: Update the chatroom header stats row in `frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx` so the horizontal gap between the message/reply count, view count, and category badge is 0.5rem (instead of 1rem).

quotes: can you make the gap for the replies views and category tag .5 rem instead of 1 rem.

acceptanceCriteria: In `ChatArea.tsx`, the container that lays out message/reply count, view count, and category badge uses a 0.5rem horizontal gap (e.g., Tailwind `gap-2`).
Visual verification: the spacing between the message/reply count group and view count group is 0.5rem.
Visual verification: the spacing between the view count group and the category badge (when present) is 0.5rem.

requirements.text: Move the LIVE indicator in `frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx` so it appears to the right of the category badge in the same stats row, and ensure the horizontal gap between the category badge and the LIVE indicator is 0.5rem.

quotes: can you also move live tag to be to the right of the category tag. make the gap for that also .5rem

acceptanceCriteria: When `chatroom.isLive` is true and `chatroom.category` is present, the LIVE indicator renders immediately to the right of the category badge in the stats row.
The horizontal gap between the category badge and the LIVE indicator is 0.5rem.
When `chatroom.category` is not present and `chatroom.isLive` is true, the LIVE indicator still renders in the stats row to the right of the existing stats items with consistent 0.5rem spacing.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing Shadcn components only).
Do not edit immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
Backend canister code and data model must remain unchanged for this layout-only update.
nonGoals: Do not change chatroom view-count/message-count logic or polling behavior.
Do not redesign the header beyond the requested spacing and LIVE badge placement.
